abstract: A former Merrill Lynch executive, Ahmass Fakahany, has been awarded $1.2 million in compensatory damages in an employment-related claim against the Wall Street investment bank.
snippet: A former Merrill Lynch executive, Ahmass Fakahany, has been awarded $1.2 million in compensatory damages in an employment-related claim against the Wall Street investment bank.
lead_paragraph: 9:20 a.m. | Updated A former Merrill Lynch executive, Ahmass Fakahany, was awarded $1.2 million in compensatory damages in an employment-related claim against the Wall Street investment bank, now owned by Bank of America.
